page.title: 01AN INTRODUCTION TO BOURNE
page.content: {Bourne}is a small {market town}at the crossroads of the A15 and A151. It has four main roads leading out of the town centre;{north}to Sleaford and Lincoln,{south}to Peterborough and London, {east}to Stamford and {west}to Spalding. {Bourne's}folk hero is Hereward The Wake. {Bourne}has a large wood on its west side where there are a few herds of deer. {Bourne}has a market two days a week. We have a fairly big park called the "Wellhead". It's the site of an old castle. { {Bourne}has a population of about 8,000. There are five schools; two primary, one secondary, one grammar and one special school. {Bourne}has all the necessary services except for a general hospital.
